text: (tab) mariyam ke bete eesa ne (baaragaahe khuda mein) arz kee khuda vanda ai hamaare paalane vaale ham par aasamaan se ek khvaan (neamat) naazil pharama ki vah din ham logon ke lie hamaare agalon ke lie aur hamaare pichhalon ke lie eed ka karaar pae (aur hamaare haq mein) teree taraph se ek badee nishaanee ho aur too hamen rozee de aur too sab rozee dene vaalo se behatar hai
